metadata.description: Top AI companies by province in China, covering ~100 companies across 15 provinces
metadata.valuation_note: Valuations are approximate, sourced from public market caps, IPO filings, and last known private funding rounds. All in billions CNY unless noted. null = not publicly available.

companies.name: ByteDance
companies.focus: LLM (Doubao), recommendation AI, video AI, generative AI
companies.valuation_note: ~$400B+ USD private valuation per Fidelity/T. Rowe Price (2025)

companies.name: Baidu
companies.focus: LLM (ERNIE), autonomous driving (Apollo), AI cloud, search
companies.valuation_note: $49.6B USD market cap (Jan 2026, NASDAQ: BIDU)

companies.name: Kuaishou
companies.focus: AI video generation (Kling), recommendation AI, short video
companies.valuation_note: $41B USD market cap (Jan 2026, HK: 1024). Kling AI $240M ARR.

companies.name: Zhipu AI (Knowledge Atlas)
companies.name_cn: 智谱华章 / 知识图谱
companies.focus: LLM (GLM series), AGI research, MaaS platform
companies.valuation_note: $17.8B USD market cap post-IPO surge (Feb 2026, HK: 2513). IPO at HK$52.8B.

companies.name: Moonshot AI
companies.focus: LLM (Kimi), long-context models, consumer AI assistant
companies.valuation_note: $4.8B USD private valuation (Jan 2026). 13M+ users.

companies.name: SenseTime
companies.focus: Computer vision, generative AI (SenseNova), smart auto, AI infra (SenseCore)
companies.valuation_note: $13.2B USD market cap (Feb 2026, HK: 0020)

companies.name: Megvii (Face++)
companies.focus: Computer vision, facial recognition, smart logistics, AIoT
companies.valuation_note: ~$4B USD (last known 2019 round). US investment ban since 2021. IPO pending.

companies.name: Cambricon Technologies
companies.focus: AI chips (training & inference), AI processors for edge and cloud
companies.valuation_note: $93B USD market cap (late 2025, SHA: 688256). Revenue surged 4,348% H1 2025. Plans to triple chip production 2026.

companies.name: Horizon Robotics
companies.focus: AI chips for autonomous driving (Journey series), ADAS SoC
companies.valuation_note: $9.7B USD market cap (mid-2025, HK: 9660). IPO raised $696M Oct 2024.

companies.name: 4Paradigm (Phancy Group)
companies.focus: Enterprise AI platform, decision-making AI, MLOps
companies.valuation_note: $3.5B USD market cap (Aug 2025, HK: 6682). Revenue 5.26B CNY in 2024.

companies.name: 01.AI
companies.focus: LLM (Yi series), open-source foundation models
companies.valuation_note: $1B+ USD unicorn (Nov 2023). Founded by Kai-Fu Lee.

companies.name: Kunlunxin (Baidu spinoff)
companies.focus: AI chips (Kunlun series), cloud AI accelerators
companies.valuation_note: Last private round ~21B CNY ($3B). Analyst targets: $16-28B USD at HK IPO (filed Jan 2026).

companies.name: Infinigence AI
companies.focus: Heterogeneous AI computing infrastructure, multi-chip orchestration
companies.valuation_note: Raised 1.5B CNY total through Series A+ (2025). Revenue 500M+ CNY projected 2025. Spun from Tsinghua. HQ Shanghai but major Beijing presence.

companies.name: MiniMax
companies.focus: LLM, consumer AI (Talkie/Hailuo), text/voice/video generation
companies.valuation_note: $15.2B USD market cap post-HK IPO (Jan 2026, HK). IPO raised $619M. Note: HQ debated Beijing/Shanghai.

companies.name: StepFun
companies.focus: LLM (Step series), multimodal AI, terminal AI partnerships (Honor, Oppo, ZTE)
companies.valuation_note: Raised 5B+ CNY in Series B+ (Jan 2026, largest single AI round in China in 12 months). One of the 'Six Tigers'.

companies.name: CloudWalk Technology
companies.focus: Facial recognition, computer vision, smart city, AI platform
companies.valuation_note: $2B USD market cap (mid-2025, SHA: 688327). Revenue ~$73M TTM.

companies.name: Yitu Technology
companies.focus: Computer vision, healthcare AI, NLP, chip design (QuestCore)
companies.valuation_note: One of China's 'Four AI Dragons'. IPO plans suspended (2021). Estimated ~$2B+ last private valuation.

companies.name: AgiBot (Zhiyuan Robotics)
companies.focus: Humanoid robots, embodied AI, industrial robotics
companies.valuation_note: $6.4B USD (Oct 2025). Planning HK IPO Q3 2026, targeting $5-6.4B. Backed by Tencent, BYD, LG, Hillhouse.

companies.name: Biren Technology
companies.focus: AI GPU chips (BR100/BR104), general-purpose GPU for cloud AI
companies.valuation_note: HK IPO Jan 2026 at HK$46.9B market cap. Raised $717M. Shares surged 76% on debut.

companies.name: Enflame Technology
companies.focus: AI training/inference GPUs (CloudBlazer), cloud computing chips
companies.valuation_note: Pre-IPO valuation RMB 20.5B ($2.8B). Filed STAR Market IPO Jan 2026, raising 6B CNY. Tencent owns 20.26%.

companies.name: Mech-Mind Robotics
companies.focus: Industrial 3D vision, AI-powered robotic automation
companies.valuation_note: ~$858M (2022 round). Planning HK IPO to raise ~$200M (2025). Heavy R&D spend (40% of revenue).

companies.name: Flexiv
companies.focus: Adaptive robots, force-controlled robotics, AI manipulation
companies.valuation_note: $1B USD valuation (unicorn). Raised $122M total.

companies.name: CloudMinds
companies.focus: Cloud robotics, HARIX robot OS, humanoid service robots
companies.valuation_note: Raised $727M total (Series C $138M in 2023). Backed by SoftBank, Foxconn. HQ Shanghai.

companies.name: Huawei
companies.focus: AI chips (Ascend 910C/950), Pangu LLM, HiSilicon, cloud AI, telecom AI
companies.valuation_note: Private. Revenue ~$100B+ USD (2024). Plans to double Ascend chip output in 2026 to 600K units. Shenzhen HQ.

companies.name: Tencent
companies.focus: LLM (Hunyuan), AI cloud, gaming AI, ad targeting AI, video/3D generation
companies.valuation_note: $709.6B USD market cap (Jan 2026, HK: 0700). China's largest company. 30+ Hunyuan models released.

companies.name: DJI
companies.focus: Drone AI, computer vision, autonomous flight, LiDAR, robotics
companies.valuation_note: ~$15B USD private. Revenue $3.5B USD (2024). 70%+ global drone market share. Shenzhen HQ.

companies.name: UBTECH Robotics
companies.focus: Humanoid robots (Walker S2), educational robots, industrial humanoids
companies.valuation_note: ~$6.7B USD market cap (Nov 2025, HK: 9880). Raised $398M placement Nov 2025. 1,000th Walker S2 produced end-2025.

companies.name: BYD (AI/ADAS division)
companies.focus: Autonomous driving (God's Eye/DiPilot), AI-powered ADAS, EV intelligence
companies.valuation_note: $121.6B USD market cap (Feb 2026, SZ: 002594). 5,000+ ADAS engineers. 14.3B USD planned AI/ADAS investment. God's Eye in 2.5M+ vehicles.

companies.name: WeRide
companies.focus: L4 autonomous driving, robotaxis, autonomous trucks/buses
companies.valuation_note: $4B USD (2022 Series D). HK IPO raised HK$2.39B (2025). Dual US/HK listing.

companies.name: Pony.ai
companies.focus: L4 autonomous driving, robotaxis, autonomous trucking
companies.valuation_note: $5.25B USD at Nasdaq IPO (Nov 2024). HK IPO raised HK$6.71B. Fleet target 3,000+ vehicles by end-2026.

companies.name: AutoX
companies.focus: L4/L5 autonomous driving, driverless robotaxis
companies.valuation_note: Private. Founded by former Princeton professor Jianxiong Xiao. Shenzhen HQ.

companies.name: Game Science
companies.focus: AI-powered game development, procedural generation (Black Myth: Wukong)
companies.valuation_note: Privately held. Black Myth earned ~$1.25B revenue, 28M copies. HQ Shenzhen + Hangzhou office.

companies.name: Alibaba (DAMO Academy / Tongyi Lab)
companies.name_cn: 阿里巴巴 (达摩院/通义实验室)
companies.focus: LLM (Qwen/Tongyi Qianwen), AI cloud, e-commerce AI, vision AI
companies.valuation_note: $364.6B USD market cap (Nov 2025, NYSE: BABA). Qwen: 600M+ downloads. AI cloud capex 38.6B CNY Q1 FY2026.

companies.name: Hikvision
companies.focus: AI-powered video surveillance, computer vision, smart city, IoT
companies.valuation_note: $39.4B USD market cap (Jan 2026, SZ: 002415). World's largest surveillance equipment maker. TTM revenue $12.9B.

companies.name: DeepSeek
companies.focus: LLM (DeepSeek-R1/V3), open-source AI models, reasoning AI
companies.valuation_note: Private subsidiary of High-Flyer Capital (幻方量化). Not seeking external funding. R1 matched GPT-4 at fraction of cost. Hangzhou HQ.

companies.name: NetEase
companies.focus: Gaming AI, NLP, AI music, education AI, AI content generation
companies.valuation_note: $78B USD market cap (Feb 2026, NASDAQ: NTES). Revenue 112.6B CNY ($16.1B) in 2025. Hangzhou HQ.

companies.name: Unitree Robotics
companies.focus: Quadruped/humanoid robots, embodied AI, consumer robots (Go2, H1)
companies.valuation_note: $1.4B USD (unicorn). Seeking up to $7B IPO valuation. Fastest IPO counseling record (132 days). Hangzhou.

companies.name: Deep Robotics
companies.focus: Quadruped robots for industrial inspection, emergency rescue, embodied AI
companies.valuation_note: ~$1.1B USD (Dec 2025). IPO counseling filed Dec 2025, targeting review June 2026. Hangzhou.

companies.name: BrainCo
companies.focus: Brain-computer interface (non-invasive), bionic prosthetics, neurotech
companies.valuation_note: ~$1.3B USD valuation (pre-IPO 2025). China's first BCI unicorn. Hangzhou.

companies.name: ManyCore Tech
companies.focus: Spatial intelligence, 3D design AI (Kujiale), spatial computing
companies.valuation_note: Raised $336M total. Filed HK IPO Feb 2025. Revenue ~664M CNY (2023). 441M+ 3D models. Hangzhou.

companies.name: Rokid
companies.focus: AR glasses with AI, spatial computing, AI assistant hardware
companies.valuation_note: $1B USD valuation (latest round). Raised $583M total. Partnered with Alibaba Tongyi. Hangzhou.

companies.name: Zhejiang Lab
companies.focus: AI research (intelligent perception, computing, networks), GeoGPT, space computing
companies.valuation_note: Government research institute (est. 2017). Not commercial entity. Launched Three-Body Computing Constellation (space AI).

companies.name: Momenta
companies.focus: L4 autonomous driving, ADAS solutions, robotaxis
companies.valuation_note: ~$6B USD valuation (Sep 2025 funding round). HQ Suzhou/Beijing. Backed by Mercedes-Benz, Grab, Toyota, Bosch.

companies.name: Horizon Robotics (Nanjing R&D)
companies.focus: AI chip R&D, ADAS processors, Nanjing AI research institute
companies.valuation_note: Major R&D center in Nanjing. Parent HK-listed (see Beijing). Co-established Nanjing Advanced AI Research Institute.

companies.name: Estun Robotics
companies.focus: Industrial robots, CNC systems, motion control, AI-powered automation
companies.valuation_note: Public on Shenzhen SE (SZ: 002747). Leading Chinese industrial robot manufacturer. Nanjing HQ.

companies.name: Ecovacs Robotics
companies.focus: Consumer service robots, robot vacuum AI, SLAM navigation
companies.valuation_note: Public (SHA: 603486). Established AI Research Institute in Nanjing (2018). Suzhou HQ.

companies.name: InfiMotion
companies.focus: Industrial AI, smart manufacturing, AI-powered motion solutions
companies.valuation_note: Wuxi-based AI startup. Limited public valuation data.

companies.name: iFlytek
companies.focus: Voice AI (China's #1), NLP, AI education, AI healthcare, Spark LLM
companies.valuation_note: $21.1B USD market cap (Jan 2026, SZ: 002230). Revenue 10.9B CNY H1 2025 (+17%). AI in 813 scenarios. Hefei HQ, founded from USTC.

companies.name: Cambrian AI (USTC ecosystem)
companies.focus: AI research talent pipeline, NLP, robotics, voice AI spin-offs
companies.valuation_note: University of Science and Technology of China (USTC) in Hefei is a major AI talent source. iFlytek and others spun from here.

companies.name: Baidu Apollo Go (Wuhan operations)
companies.focus: Robotaxi deployment, L4 autonomous driving at scale
companies.valuation_note: ~400 robotaxis across 1,160 sq miles (one-third of Wuhan). China's largest robotaxi deployment. Subsidiary of Baidu.

companies.name: Wuhan AI Innovation Center
companies.name_cn: 武汉人工智能创新中心
companies.focus: AI research, photonics-AI intersection, smart city AI
companies.valuation_note: Government-backed. Wuhan leverages its optics/photonics strength (Wuhan Optics Valley) for AI hardware.

companies.name: Zhipu AI (Chengdu regional hub)
companies.focus: Regional LLM (Zhipu Zhuge for Sichuan), AI infrastructure, model training center
companies.valuation_note: Zhipu received 300M CNY from Chengdu government fund. Building regional AI model 'Zhuge' and training center in Chengdu.

companies.name: Chengdu AI ecosystem
companies.focus: Smart manufacturing AI, game AI, autonomous driving testing
companies.valuation_note: Core AI industry scale targeted at 130B CNY by 2025. Computing power goal: 20,000P. 10+ national LLMs, 80+ industry models.

companies.name: Haier Smart Home
companies.focus: Smart home AI, IoT platform, AI-powered appliances, natural language interaction
companies.valuation_note: $33.9B USD market cap (Jan 2026, SHA: 600690). 122,733 employees. Qingdao HQ.

companies.name: Hisense
companies.focus: AI-powered displays, smart home AI, automotive AI, healthcare AI
companies.valuation_note: Hisense Visual Technology: $4.6B USD (Jan 2026, SHA: 600060). AI innovations at CES 2025. Qingdao HQ.

companies.name: Neusoft
companies.focus: AI-driven digital solutions, healthcare AI, automotive software, cloud AI
companies.valuation_note: $1.58B USD market cap (Jun 2025, SHA: 600718). Revenue $1.61B TTM. Forbes China Top 30 Go-International (2025). Shenyang HQ.

companies.name: Siasun Robot & Automation
companies.focus: Industrial robotics, collaborative robots, smart factory AI
companies.valuation_note: Public (SZ: 300024). China's largest listed robotics company. Shenyang HQ, affiliated with Chinese Academy of Sciences.

companies.name: Tianjin AI Manufacturing Hub
companies.name_cn: 天津人工智能制造基地
companies.focus: Industrial AI, smart manufacturing, AI for ports/logistics
companies.valuation_note: Government-backed zone. Focus on cross-border AI services and smart port automation.

companies.name: Zoomlion (AI division)
companies.focus: AI-powered construction equipment, smart manufacturing, industrial IoT
companies.valuation_note: Zoomlion public (SHA: 000157). Changsha HQ. Applying AI to construction machinery and smart factories.

companies.name: Chongqing AI + Automotive Hub
companies.name_cn: 重庆智能网联汽车基地
companies.focus: Smart connected vehicles, AI manufacturing, electronics AI
companies.valuation_note: Chengdu-Chongqing region designated as national smart manufacturing and robotics hub. Pilot base for intelligent connected vehicles.

companies.name: CATL (AI capabilities)
companies.focus: AI battery monitoring, smart manufacturing AI, AI-enabled energy storage
companies.valuation_note: $225B USD market cap (Jan 2026, SZ: 300750). AI monitoring ecosystem. Ningde, Fujian HQ. Not primarily AI but increasingly AI-enabled.

companies.name: Xi'an AI Research Cluster
companies.name_cn: 西安人工智能研究集群
companies.focus: AI research (Xi'an Jiaotong University), military AI applications, aerospace AI
companies.valuation_note: Xi'an is a major defense/aerospace AI hub. Strong university research base. Multiple military-industrial AI labs.

notable_trends_2026: Wave of Chinese AI IPOs on Hong Kong Stock Exchange (Zhipu, MiniMax, Biren, Enflame filings)
Hangzhou 'Six Little Dragons' collectively valued at 300B+ CNY
Cambricon market cap reached $93B making it China's most valuable pure-play AI chip company
ByteDance valued at $400B+ driven by Doubao AI assistant (60M MAU)
DeepSeek R1 shockwave: demonstrated frontier AI at fraction of US costs, accelerated Chinese AI investment
Huawei planning to double Ascend 910C production to 600K chips in 2026
Humanoid robotics boom: AgiBot ($6.4B), UBTECH, Unitree all scaling production
